name: 2Bot
description:
In 2Bot, you solve puzzles as HandBot and EyeBot: Two halves of a full robot that can be joined together. If you'd like, you can play co-op, giving each bot to a different player so two players have to join together as well.

HandBot is controlled using WASD and Space EyeBot is controlled using the arrow keys.

Press L to restart a level if you trap yourself (or if you encounter a level-breaking bug I didn't notice)

Note: The game's audio bugged out last minute so I was forced to obliterate it. Oh, well... At least most of the game is mostly functional.
